code: import{useState}from'react';import{api}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TransferForm(_ref){let{token}=_ref;const[fromAcc,setFromAcc]=useState('');const[toAcc,setToAcc]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');async function send(){const res=await api('/api/accounts/transfer','POST',{from_account:Number(fromAcc),to_account:Number(toAcc),amount:Number(amount)},token);alert(res.message);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Transfer Money"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"From Account ID",onChange:e=>setFromAcc(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"To Account ID",onChange:e=>setToAcc(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Amount",onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:send,children:"Transfer"})]});}
